ConfigFileArguments:
#ALGORITHMPARAMETERS#
 url = "stratum+tcp://#SERVER#:#PORT#"  
 username = "#LOGIN#" 
 password = "#PASSWORD#"  
[gpus.#GpuPlatform#-0]
 enabled = true 
[gpus.#GpuPlatform#-1]
 enabled = true 
[gpus.#GpuPlatform#-2]
 enabled = true 
[gpus.#GpuPlatform#-3]
 enabled = true 
[gpus.#GpuPlatform#-4]
 enabled = true 
[gpus.#GpuPlatform#-5]
  enabled = true 
[gpus.#GpuPlatform#-6]
 enabled = true 
[gpus.#GpuPlatform#-7]
 enabled = true  
[cpu]
  enabled = false
